name: SwapNights.com
tag_list: swap, exchange, contra, accommodation, hotel, vacation-rental, lodge, inn, bed-and-breakfast, vrbo, homeaway
overview:
SwapNights.com is a website exclusively for professional accommodation operators who want to swap accommodation with other operators around the world.

SwapNights.com has been developed by a small, passionate team lead by Simon St John, an Australian-based author and travel writer.

The SwapNights.com team has one desire – to provide a space exclusively for the owners and managers of accommodation worldwide to swap their accommodation for a short break or longer holiday with other owners and managers.

SwapNights.com also welcomes membership from owners of second and holiday homes, even if not generally available for rental, so long as they are not private homes that are a members’ principal place of residence (these are well-catered to with home swapping sites with which we do not compete).

Swaps can be for a range of reasons:

  • Swap holiday at different times
  • Swap holiday at the same time
  • Staff incentive/training swap
  • Swap and Operate (swap and run each other’s’ property for a working holiday)
